name: L-BUS
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The user account binding operation of L-BUS APP could be completed quickly according to the following steps:
1.Download L-BUS APP through Apple store or Google play or scan the QR code, then register and login;
2.Open 「L-BUS」App, click the top right “+” to add the devices. Complete the net set-up of the devices in following operation instructions.
3.Click “More” to enter Zones Setting operation interface. Edit the zone’s name, lighting types of zones, ect.
4.Open the 「Amazon Alexa」APP, and click the sidebar to enter“ Skills & Games”. Click the top right “Search”. Enter “L-BUS” for searching the skills. Click “ENABLE TO USE”to login account and password of “L-BUS”, done the binding. 
5.Click “ DISCOVER DEVICES”to search devices that you are going to add and control by Alexa. 
6.Feel free to contact us if any question: 400-716-8928

Supported devices
led strips, ceiling light, down light, spot light, neon light, etc.
